Crimes.Crime_Name: Misrepresentation under Immigration and Refugee Protection Act
Crimes.Legal_Issue: Reasonableness of Visa Officer's inadmissibility finding based on misrepresentation
Crimes.Credibility_Assessment: Applicant held accountable despite blaming consultant
Crimes.Evidence_Type: Application forms, residential and employment history, educational background
Crimes.Basis_of_Claim: Omission of U.S. studies and discrepancies in personal history
Crimes.Evaluation_Standard: Whether misrepresentation could induce error in administration of the Act
Crimes.Key_Factor_in_Determination: Materiality and relevance of omitted information
Crimes.Application_Error: Omission of U.S. study period and inconsistencies in employment/residence
Crimes.Application_Factor: Signed application form makes applicant responsible
Crimes.Cause_of_Refusal: Omission of U.S. study period and discrepancies in residential/employment details
Crimes.Evidentiary_Issues: Unintentional errors claimed but not accepted due to signed application
Crimes.Procedural_Fairness: Application process followed; accountability on applicant
Crimes.Credibility_Issues: Applicant's claim of consultant error not sufficient to override responsibility
Crimes.Legal_Defense_or_Challenge: Claim that omissions were unintentional and irrelevant
Crimes.Procedural_Issue: Judicial review after refusal by immigration authority

Crimes.Crime_Name: Failure to disclose material facts under Immigration and Refugee Protection Act
Crimes.Legal_Issue: Reasonableness of Visa Officer's inadmissibility finding for withholding material facts
Crimes.Credibility_Assessment: Applicant not excused for consultantâ€™s errors
Crimes.Evidence_Type: Residential history, employment records, educational background
Crimes.Basis_of_Claim: Failure to disclose U.S. studies and inconsistencies in personal history
Crimes.Evaluation_Standard: Potential to induce error in administration of the Act
Crimes.Application_Error: Omission of material facts in application
Crimes.Legal_Standard: Withholding material facts under IRPA s.40(1)(a)
Crimes.Decision_Outcome: Inadmissible due to failure to disclose material facts
Crimes.Cause_of_Refusal: Omission and misrepresentation of material facts
Crimes.Procedural_Fairness: Due process observed in application and review stages
Crimes.Credibility_Issues: Lack of intent not a defense when material facts are omitted
Crimes.Legal_Defense_or_Challenge: Attribution of errors to immigration consultant
Crimes.Procedural_Issue: No certified questions proposed in judicial review
